summary:
As an experienced financial risk manager, I bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise to any team. My experience in market, liquidity, and credit risk management has provided me with a comprehensive understanding of risk management and the regulatory landscape.

I hold a Master of Science in Business Administration with a focus on International Management from the University of Amsterdam, and a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration with a specialization in Finance, Banking, and Insurance from the Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich. These degrees, combined with my professional experience, have provided me with a solid theoretical background and practical skills that I can apply to any role in the financial services industry.

Throughout my career, I have demonstrated an ambitious, conscientious, and resilient approach to my work, and I am always eager to learn and confront new challenges. I have a passion for international business and a desire to explore different cultures and communicate with people from diverse backgrounds.

As a native Bulgarian, I am fluent in English and German, and I have a great interest in finance, management, and international business. I am particularly drawn to the areas of financial risk management where I can further develop my skills and contribute to the success of any organization.

I am confident that my experience, skills, and passion make me a valuable asset to any team, and I look forward to exploring new opportunities in the financial risk management area.

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 71658451, 'name': 'Bitvavo', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGsjcJx-L2uLQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1629278566685?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=vsBxZFi3FMs-l635Bxcfik-HLIKuEaIZjbWS9PlPXX0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/bitvavocom/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Bitvavo', 'description': "*Developing and implementing VAR models to measure market risk exposure, helping the company to quantify its exposure to market risk and manage it effectively.
*Developing risk limits and guidelines, ensuring that risk-taking activities are aligned with the organization's risk appetite and strategic goals.
*Monitoring market trends and developments, providing regular updates to senior management and the Board on the latest market risks and opportunities.
*Conducting comprehensive risk assessments to identify and analyze current and prospective counterparties, and developing credit risk exposure limits and monitoring reports to manage credit risk effectively.
*Establishing and maintaining credit risk policies and procedures, including underwriting standards, credit approval processes, and collateral requirements.
*Monitoring credit exposures to counterparties, ensuring compliance with credit risk limits and guidelines.
*Developing and implementing models to measure credit risk exposure for cryptocurrency lending and borrowing activities.
*Developing and maintaining the Asset and Liability Management (ALM) process, ensuring that the company's liquidity risk is managed effectively.
*Developing and implementing contingency funding plans, ensuring that the company has sufficient liquidity to meet its obligations in adverse market conditions.
*Conducting stress testing and scenario analysis to assess the impact of liquidity shocks on the company's financial position.
*Developing and implementing models to measure liquidity risk exposure for cryptocurrency exchanges and trading platforms.", 'title': 'Financial Risk Officer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 2594164, 'name': 'ING', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQEzlL9vyovZuw/company-logo_400_400/0/1691398576637?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=A7mZDaPIDnXWA4Cd7LMkH8kTLNF0JLBxfMrUlLPC2XI', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/ing/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'ING', 'description': "* Conduct monitoring and analysis of balance sheet risks, perform risk analysis with explanations of variations and exceptions, and link them to the Bank’s business model and economic environment.
*Design and implement risk appetite frameworks, limit setting, allocation, and monitoring to manage credit, liquidity, and funding risks.
*Participate in ALCO activities, including report preparation, conducting analysis, and providing recommendations to senior managers with respect to Bank's liquidity risk exposures.
*Participate in and implement global liquidity stress testing and perform activities related to ICLAAP.
*Analyzing and preparing reports on the Bank's financial condition, risk management practices, and compliance with regulatory requirements.
*Prepare advice on financial risk management and present to senior stakeholders.
*Support the production of new regulatory reports and adapt existing processes to ensure completeness, correctness, and timely submission of Group and regulatory reports.
*Participate/lead change projects and train junior team members to improve competencies and expertise within the team.
*Collaborate with key stakeholders across the business, including Finance and Group Treasury, to provide appropriate risk input and perspective.
*Ensure compliance with ECB's Guide on climate-related and environmental risks for credit and liquidity risk by implementing policy changes, setting risk appetite statements, and defining climate risk reporting and monitoring standards.
*Conduct stress testing and scenario analysis to assess the impact of adverse events on the Bank's financial position.
*Provide input to capital and liquidity planning, and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
*Collaborate with internal and external auditors to ensure effective risk management controls.
*Stay current on industry trends, regulatory changes, and best practices in financial risk management, and make recommendations for continuous improvement.", 'title': 'Financial Risk Specialist Credit and Liquidity Risk', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 486661, 'name': 'Raiffeisenbank Bulgaria', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGha424DFPJ-Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1628969414006?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=rmSTpwLcEZIFAk0uyaARjto6rmcp2D4rgwhFd2SMMJ8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/raiffeisen-bank-bulgaria/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Sofia, Bulgaria', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Raiffeisenbank Bulgaria', 'description': '*Ongoing control of Bank’s Liquidity gap structure
*Data consistency checks of validators and KPIs in the Market and Liquidity Management systems
*Implementation of BASEL III and other Liquidity Risk Frameworks
*Calculation of NSFR, LCR and monitoring of Time-to-Wall limits
*Maintenance and steering of Liquidity Buffers
*Monitoring and calculation of Liquidity FTP
*Preparation of ALCO materials – both Liquidity and Market Risk Chapters
*Contribution to the development of liquidity risk management tools, models and methodologies, back-testing and stress-testing
*Development and update of norms and procedures for monitoring of the market and liquidity risk
*ICAAP process preparation (Market and Liquidity Risk Economic Capital figures)
 Analysis of Capital Markets/ Treasury proposals regarding market and liquidity risk
*Cooperate with business units and product owners and with other banking functions to set risk profiles, polices/procedures and monitor their implementation
*Daily reporting of risk management data, risk figures and limit utilization/ positions to the local management and to the Head Office
*Analysis of new products from market, counterparty and liquidity risk perspective
*Validation of valuation and pricing models of new products and their impact on the liquidity position of the Bank
*Support Basel II Market Risk and Basel III Liquidity Risk reporting projects
*Support the implementation of all Head Office projects and initiatives on local level
*Support the Head Office in the setup and implementation of new pricing functions and required market data
*Fulfillment of local regulatory requirements regarding market and liquidity risk', 'title': 'Risk Manager, Market and Liquidity Risk Management Department', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Raiffeisenbank Bulgaria', 'description': "*Supervision of market  risk and connected limits - FX risk, interest rate risk, credit spread risk, equity commodity and other price risks for both trading and banking book (VaR, Sensitivity, Special measurement methodologies).
*Monitoring of liquidity risk limits.
*Supervision of stop-loss limits of the portfolios measured at fair value.
*Ongoing control of counter-party exposure/limit compliance with respect to Treasury operations.
*Periodical reporting of risk management data and limit utilization/positions to local management.
*Preparation of reports and presentation to the Senior Risk Managers and the Head of the Department in case of limit breaches.
*Support of the Risk Managers in the analysis of Capital Markets and Treasury Departments' proposals regarding market and liquidity risk perspective.
*Support in the preparation of the respective regulatory reporting regarding Basel II Market Risk and Basel III Liquidity Risk Projects.
*Support in the development of risk management tools, models and methodologies - calculation of Value at Risk for different portfolios/positions, back-testing and stress-testing.
*Cooperation with the IT department in the preparation of new reports.
*High-Watermark Stop-loss limit calculation and special limits utilization.
*Support the Senior Risk Managers in the preparation of monthly reports presented to the local Asset and Liability Management Committee.
*Analysis of the new products from market, counterparty and  liquidity risk perspective.
Validation of regulatory reports (Liquidity Coverage Ratio, etc.).
*Support the Senior Risk Managers in the daily data delivery process to the HO and ensure the completeness on correctness of the data.
*Execution of  the daily Mark-to-Market revaluation of securities portfolios process.
*Preparation of the daily benchmark index (Sofibor/Sofibid) quotation .", 'title': 'Junior Risk Manager, Market and Liquidity Risk Management Department', 'employment_type': None}]}]
